title: Bug 269912wasted time building message context when it is only used for command line builds
description: The context for a message is created even when AspectJ is used inside AJDTbut the context only ever gets used when printing messages to System.out.Under AJDT we ought to be able to 'switch it off'
OB: Bug 269912wasted time building message context when it is only used for command line builds
